metadata.name: Lucky AngPao NFT
metadata.description: For the year of the tiger, only 8,888 lucky Angpao NFTs will be minted. There will be 8 lucky winners who can win up to 80ETH. 10% of the proceeds will be donated to World Wildlife Fund - Save the Malayan Tiger Project. Are you ready to be one of the lucky winners? Mint one today on angpaonft.io
